statements: SELECT * FROM customer_orders;
SELECT customer_id, product_id FROM customer_orders WHERE order_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM customer_orders WHERE customer_id = 456 AND order_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT order_id, quantity FROM customer_orders WHERE product_id IN (101, 102, 103);
SELECT order_id, order_date FROM customer_orders WHERE quantity > 5 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_orders WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT customer_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM customer_orders GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_quantity DESC
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id, product_id FROM customer_orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' AND order_date <= '2022-12-31'
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(DISTINCT product_id) AS unique_products FROM customer_orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING unique_products > 1
SELECT order_id, customer_id, product_id, quantity, order_date FROM customer_orders WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY order_id ASC
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2023-01-01' ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, count(order_id) as total_orders FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_orders > 5;
SELECT customer_id, sum(price*quantity) as total_spent FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE first_name = 'John';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(order_id) AS total_orders FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_orders > 1;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(price) AS total_spent FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT c.first_name, o.quantity, p.product_id FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN products p ON o.product_id = p.product_id WHERE o.quantity > 5;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE in_stock = TRUE;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE in_stock = TRUE;
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_address = 'New York';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_address FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price > 50.00 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount < 1000.00;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_address = '123 Main St';
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT orders.order_id, orders.total_amount, shipping_details.shipping_address FROM orders INNER JOIN shipping_details ON orders.order_id = shipping_details.order_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 2 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity, total_price FROM order_details WHERE order_id = 1;
